reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Challenging class, but Dr. Emily Johnson is excellent at breaking down difficult topics.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: The course material is tough, but Dr. Michael Brown is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures, though the exams are a bit difficult.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Amazing professor, very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Very insightful and encourages deep thinking, but grades tough.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Good lectures, but sometimes hard to follow. Recitations are helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Interesting class, very interactive and lots of group discussions.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Course material is hard to grasp, and the professor's teaching style is a bit confusing.

reviews.subject: Spanish I
reviews.review: Excellent language teacher, makes learning Spanish fun and engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Interesting content but the professor can be a bit dry in lectures.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Good at explaining concepts, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Biology II
reviews.review: Fantastic professor, really cares about his students' success.

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: Decent course, but assignments are not always clearly explained.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging discussions and thought-provoking assignments.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, her enthusiasm makes the class enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Very difficult class, and the professor is not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Business Law
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and provides real-world examples, but exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Chemistry II
reviews.review: Good professor, but the material is very challenging.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Amazing class, Prof. Green really pushes you to develop your writing skills.
